bio:
Paratus Decimius, an Imperial man, is a mage with the Synod, the most respected magical organization in Cyrodiil. He is the last surviving member of a Synod expedition to Mzulft, an ancient Dwemer ruin. 
The player may bring Paratus the focusing crystal that his Synod counterpart Gavros Plinius had lost. Paratus is barricaded in the Oculory in Mzulft by himself.
name: Paratus Decimius
